abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Lasthenia californica DC. ex Lindl." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbario de la Facultad de Farmacia de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid (MAF) 1 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 1 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 1 records from Jardin Botanique de Lyon 1 records from Moscow University Herbarium (MW) 1 records from Texas Tech University, E. L. Reed Herbarium 1 records from Muestreos y recolectas de flora endémica y casi-endémica de matorral costero y chaparral de la zona mediterránea Baja California, México 1 records from Michigan State University Herbarium Vascular Plants 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from SFSU - Vascular Plants of the Harry D. Thiers Herbarium at San Francisco State University 1 records from Agnes Marion Ayre Herbarium (NFLD) 1 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 1 records from University of Jena, Herbarium Haussknecht - Herbarium JE 1 records from IAC - Herbário do Instituto Agronômico de Campinas 1 records from SP - Herbário do Estado "Maria Eneyda P. Kaufmann Fidalgo" - Coleção de Fanerógamas 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Palynology Collection 1 records from Staten Island Museum 1 records from Royal BC Museum - Herbarium (V) 1 records from Museu Paraense Emilio Goeldi Herbarium 1 records from Plantas de La Frontera (ecorregión 12.1.1.1), e inventario florístico del Rancho El Aribabi, municipio de Imuris, Sonora 1 records from MBM - Herbário do Museu Botânico Municipal 1 records from CONN 1 records from Estonian University of Life Sciences Institute of Agricultural and Environmental Sciences Vascular Plant Herbarium 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 2 records from Vascular Plant Collection - University of Washington Herbarium (WTU) 2 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 2 records from BLM - National Landscape Monitoring Framework - Plants 2 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 2 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Botany) Seed Plant Collection 2 records from CSUSB - California State University San Bernardino 2 records from Bell Museum plants 2 records from SysTax - Botanical Gardens 2 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O) UiO 2 records from K herbarium - Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Amostras Brasileiras Repatriadas - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 2 records from Herbarium Horti Botanici Pisani (PI), Sistema Museale di Ateneo, Università di Pisa 2 records from University of Alberta Vascular Plant Herbarium (ALTA-VP) 2 records from Flora de las playas y dunas costeras de México 2 records from Geneva Herbarium – De Candolle's Prodromus (G-DC) 3 records from Kathryn Kalmbach Herbarium 3 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 3 records from Bernice P.
